website_summaries.verdict: Comprehensive manual treadmill offers stability, comfort, and 16 levels of resistance to improve cardiovascular fitness and strength.
pros: Features more versatility than most manual treadmills, with resistance levels and different hand grip options
Heavy-duty frame supports up to 300 pounds
Locks into place but features wheels for easy transport
cons: Incline is fixed and cannot be adjusted

customer_reviews.title: Home gym must have
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. I was worried it would be weird to use but you really can just set your own pace. The incline is high but it doesn't bother you like you'd think it would, very easy to use. I love that I can be pacing around and step on it for 10 seconds if I want. Folds up well and to let loose you just hit a button and it lowers itself. Doesn't take up a lot of room and is minimal so it doesn't make things feel crowded. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: montana

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill was easy to put together and is very sturdy. Provides a realistic workout because as the user provides all of the energy to keep the belt moving. Unlike a motorized unit where the motor moves the belt. You can adjust the tension on the belt to go from an easy walk to a full sprint. The only drawback is there is not a water bottle holder or a place to put an Ipad. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: bobo

customer_reviews.title: Pick a different model
customer_reviews.text: Decent treadmill. I was very disappointed that the band you walk on continuously tries to slide off the supports while walking. I have to run to the side every few minutes in order to reposition it. It’s very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: MamaLove

customer_reviews.title: Just get on and walk
customer_reviews.text: I use this treadmill to burn extra calories when I don’t want to go outside to exercise. It was fairly easy to put together and it gives you the ability to incline walk or jog the entire time. I recommend this for someone who wants to exercise without leaving their home or does not want a treadmill that runs on electricity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheap and not a toy to play with
customer_reviews.text: It is a little over 400 dollars and is not motorized so not a lot to go wrong. You just get on and set the resistance and take off and when you go, it goes. And when you stop it stops. I cant see why anyone would get a motorized one of these.........hey do you want somewhere to sit down and have bite to eat??!! Geesh get off your ass and actually work out. Here is your machine for a lot less than those motorized things that ending being a place to throw you clothes on.
customer_reviews.author: littlebigman

customer_reviews.title: nope
customer_reviews.text: after almost a year of use, this machine is a big regret. Just stay away. Everything about it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Spacekase

customer_reviews.title: Belt is not Stable
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill its self, is sturdy and doesn't wobble (I'm 215lbs). However I couldn't enjoy it for long because A FEW steps into my workout, the belt keeps sliding. I have attempted to tighten it multiple times with no luck. Im giving it a 1 star because without a stable belt you can't work out, so I feel like I spent 500$ for nothing. I thought maybe they just over exaggerated about the weight limit but even my daughter walking caused the belt to slip.
customer_reviews.author: Breona

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: It’s everything I wanted in a manual treadmill. I use every other day have had for one month. It’s so easy to fold up after use, just press a button. The treadmill running surface is not cushioned as some motorized treadmills, but this is fine for me. I’m so glad I purchased this!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna zack

customer_reviews.title: Belt sliding left or right after a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: The belt keeps sliding left or right after a few minutes and every-time I try to adjust it like in the manual, but to no avail. I would return it but I do not have the box anymore. Anyway the box was destroyed and wet on delivery. The tread mill also makes a whining noise from the belt. What a waste of my time and money. Very disappointed in the SUNNY brand.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Pancakes

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: At first I liked it cause it was convenient for me since I didn’t like wasting my hard earned money on going to the gym but I regret buying this item. Reason being is the belt-I spent more time adjusting the belt more than I spent on running on the treadmill itself. I followed the instructions on how to lube the belt and adjusting it on both sides with the tool that’s provided. I’m just gonna buy an exercise bike and continue with my fitness journey. First time for everything right :(
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: The belt slides out of adjustment all the time, which is incredibly frustrating. It winds up slowing you down and No matter how many times I try to adjust it, lubricated it or set it back on track. I enjoy using a treadmill everyday and this was a disappointment. I'm returning it this week.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Workout
customer_reviews.text: Much better workout that a powered treadmill. You have to push the belt with your feet instead of just lifting your legs on a motorized treadmill. There was some concern with the belt rubbing on the side of the frame but this is solved by adjusting the tension of the belt. There are two tension adjustment bolts on the left and right, after I found the correct tension, no problem at all. I also recommend buying a Polar Heart Rate Monitor that can be synced up with your phone to track heart rate, calories burned and workout time.
customer_reviews.author: ROHALIO DA SILVA

customer_reviews.title: Belt unstable don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Tried every type of adjustment recommended by the manual and then some. The belt constantly slides to one side making this treadmill useless
customer_reviews.author: kaiman

customer_reviews.title: Belt Slides
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item but I am having troubles keeping the belt from sliding left or right. I’ve tried tightening and loosening but still keep getting the same results. Just need some help I seen something about the rollers being parallel not sure what that means. I want to like this item just need to get this belt thing handled.
customer_reviews.author: Garrick James

customer_reviews.title: Decent machine.
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Perfect shape at time of delivery. Easy assembly and everything that required a bolt to hold it together lined up great. Took a few minutes to get the running surface tracking correctly. But it was easy to do. I’m 58 and I think with very little practice I could run on it. I am only going to walk on it and it seems a first to be a decent workout at the elevation built in. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JakeHall

customer_reviews.title: Workout
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this machine right before the COVID-19 isolation. Since my gym closed until further notice this machine is exactly what I needed to replace my gym for the time being. Best thing I've purchased to workout inside.
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA NAVA

customer_reviews.title: Great Cardio
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived in a timely manner, was very easy to assembly. I did have a problem with the belt moving to the right side, pulled out the owners manual read the directions on how to adjust, problem was solved. I'm very pleased with this motorless treadmill. It gives you a good cardio workout different from walking on a flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Johns

customer_reviews.title: Need help. It works but not quiet at all.
customer_reviews.text: Question: how to make the ‘ding-ding-ding’ sound go away? I read some review says this model is smooth and quiet. But I am not sure if mine were damaged during shipping or it is normal a manual treadmill makes that sound like screws in somewhere were loosen.... The sound is very annoying I have to wear earplugs to mitigate the noise.....please help. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Sliding belt
customer_reviews.text: Belt slides off to the side and becomes unusable too often. Super inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Houston

customer_reviews.title: Time to get fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very solid. The belt is quiet when walking or running. The incline facilitates a smooth waking motion, but it also presents a nice challenge. Running seems natural and the landing provides plenty of length for long strides. This is definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: EDC

customer_reviews.title: BUY SOMETHING BETTER
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this, but couldn't even get through the setup process due to the fact it came with cross-threaded belt adjustment screws. The belt adjustment system is too finicky, weak, and destined to fail (lots of other reviews mention same problem). Also, upon attempting to walk on it I noticed how loud it was, probably because there is no shock absorption or cushioning system like other treadmills have. Returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: 18thstreetstyle

customer_reviews.title: I love this treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I really love this treadmill. Easy to put together. Best part is I did not have to think about where I should plug it in because it is manual. I get a really great workout from this thing!
customer_reviews.author: DeeL

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality across the board
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill in essence was really good. However, the item was a RETURNED MODEL FROM A PREVIOUS BUYER. We saw rusted parts, cracked portions of the frame, and the belt misaligned after a few uses. The entire thing took almost two hours to put together. The product had potential to be really good but alignment and a pre-owned product when it was marked as "new" really set it as a 1 Star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: Tough workout. Worth the money. I was able to get it upstairs by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: packaged well, need two people to assemble, less of a headache. stereo-ish instructions. but overall good product. my wife likes it and thats what counts. gotta keep them happy boys.
customer_reviews.author: agustin a. cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money - the belt has to be adjusted continuously!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money - the belt has to be adjusted continuously! I can walk for like 5 minutes before having to fit it. Ugh! Going in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Reach your fitness goals
customer_reviews.text: This treadmill makes you work! Seems pretty easy but you will burn calories. I've primarily used the treadmill at the gym for 35 min easy. But this is another beast on it's on. If your serious about putting in work then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: LANCE K MORRIS

customer_reviews.title: slides to the left
customer_reviews.text: this is a bad treadmill, it keeps sliding to the left and i have not been able to use it at all
customer_reviews.author: Rosine Kayitesi

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Though fairly easy to assemble the design of this product is poor as the belt slides to the side and starts scraping which aside from causing extra wear and tear is horrible to have to listen to while walking.Also there was some kinda indent or preexisting damage on the belt.I really must advise against buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: honest consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good cheapish indoor running option for smokey CA
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, quiet, very versatile. it is missing a lot of technological features (distance/speed displays). But the biggest draw for this one is the long plank length for getting a good running stride and even a sustained sprint (~6 ft user). Very impressed and happy to have it on these smokey west coast days.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment to workout with
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy well construction. Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your Money
customer_reviews.text: It's OK but not worth the Price. For that much money I recommend spending a little more to get a Quality Electric One
customer_reviews.author: Wisteri

customer_reviews.title: Machine gets jam every 5 min
customer_reviews.text: I first got it because it was cheap and no noise but no worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mmtaxman

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This machine completely broke down after only a few uses. Like other reviewers, I had the track issue sliding from side to side but it is adjustable with the tool they give you. The bigger issue is that something in one of the wheels was making a horrible cranking sound that was so loud my entire family could hear it from inside the house, even though the treadmill is in the garage. It was so loud that I could not hear music through my noise cancelling headsets. Do not buy this treadmill. It is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Miao

customer_reviews.title: The belt is horrible and constantly moves.
customer_reviews.text: The belt constantly moves back-and-forth and has to be adjusted while you’re using it. I wouldn’t buy it again because of the belt. It looks like any negative results of this product are either blockers or deleted.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Pinkard

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: First of all, treadmill came 3 days earlier than stated 👍🏾. I gave assemble 4 stars only because the handle bars was a bit of a pain to assemble. I built this in about a hour by myself. It wasn’t a million pieces to assemble. I played with it for about 10 seconds, it’s okay. Con: the high is not that tight, could be a little bit tighter. Overall: nice investment
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda smith

customer_reviews.title: Please read before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Sunny you have one job and failed. What good is a treadmill that the belt constantly slides to the left side. Lots of other reviews with the same issue. I purchased this treadmill directly from Sunny and not through Amazon. From day one, the belt has not stayed in place. I have adjusted the rollers to center the treadmill belt (per the instruction manual) multiple times and cannot get it to stay in place for even one 15 minute walking session. Darn thing has been frustratingly useless. The rest of the machine is solidly built and if the belt stayed in place I’d be very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ann G

product_meta.title: Sunny Health & Fitness Manual Treadmill with 16 Levels of Magnetic Resistance, 300 LB Max Weight and Dual Flywheels
feature_bullets: MULTI-GRIP HANDRAILS: Sweat-resistant rails support many grips, so you can push against the tread and run or walk in various positions
AMPLE TREAD DECK: Large running surface (53L X 16W) provides support and room for exercise. The manual treadmill measures at 59L X 27W X 55H inches with a max weight of 300LBS. 13. 5% Fixed Incline
MANUAL TREAD: Requires zero electricity and completely self-powered. The adjustable resistance and fixed incline allow you to enjoy a versatile and muscular power based cardio workouts
16 RESISTANCE LEVELS: 16 levels of magnetic tension provide the opportunity for a full body cardio workout.

DUAL STRUCTURE FLYWHEELS: Creates stable and smooth response for the user. Weight of flywheels requires a higher energy demand from the user to get the belt started. Increases speed, power output and tensions

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
